item.description:
Jazz Duo with a Seaside Brunch and beach walk

Sunday March 27th, 11 am.

Ashworth by the Sea Hotel

295 Ocean Blvd Hampton, NH

Host: Deb G.

Co-host: Steve O. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Steve O. wrote:

    This sounds like fun to me. Join us,and our host Deb G. and her friends for some great jazz duo, a great brunch buffet and great company, all seaside. I am not the Organizer for this event. But, I will be there to help Deb G. and introduce everyone. Please RSVP ASAP!! Deb is hopping to pit a reservation in ASAP. But, if you don't rsvp in time? We will do what we can to try and get you at seat. So you can join us. The beach walk will all depend on the weather.

Deb G. wrote:

Let's meet for a brunch buffet with a jazz duo. Maybe the weather will be nice and we can take a walk on the beach afterward.

Join us for great food and lively conversation in a relaxed intimate setting while meeting other singles at the Ashworth in Hampton, NH.  Please RSVP if you are interested in attending. You will be responsible for showing up, paying your own expenses (separate bills will be requested) and having a great time! I will make the reservation and let the staff know that separate bills are requested.

http://www.ashworthho...
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group
